ko.intro-service-title2: 여행산업을 변화시키고 있는 Travel Tech Company
ko.intro-service-text1-2: 2010년, 국내 OTA 업계 최초로 Dynamic Package의 개념을 만들었습니다.
ko.intro-service-text2-2: 2015년 처음 선보인 이후, 대부분의 이커머스 여행 메타 서비스의 표준이 되었습니다.
ko.intro-service-text3-2: 삼성, LG 등 그룹사의 출장자들은 트래포트가 만든 출장 플랫폼을 사용하고 있습니다.
ko.intro-history-text7: 세계 최초 일정표 커머스 서비스 트래블하우 '어디갈까' 오픈
ko.intro-history-text16: 국내 최초 랜드팩 예약 및 관리시스템 오픈
ko.intro-history-text17: 국내 최초 항공사 에어텔 실시간 예약시스템 오픈
ko.intro-history-text18: 렌터카 예약서비스 오픈 (전세계 40여 개 렌터카 업체 서비스)
ko.intro-history-text19: 유레일패스, 유럽철도 구간권, Amtrak, JR패스 실시간 예약시스템 오픈
ko.intro-history-text20: 국내 최초 여행사 여행상품 가격비교 및 실시간 예약시스템 오픈
ko.intro-history-text21: 옥션 여행 사이트(tour.auction.co.kr) 오픈 및 운영
ko.intro-history-text22: 트래포트 항공, 호텔 실시간 예약 어플 오픈
ko.intro-history-text23: b2b.traport.com 호텔판매 제휴사용 B2B 사이트 오픈
ko.intro-history-text26: 토파스여행정보㈜ New Booking Engine(항공, 호텔) 공급
ko.intro-history-text28: www.traport.com 오픈 - 국내 최초 Dynamic Package Solution
ko.intro-history-text29: SK투어비스㈜ BTMS(Business Travel Management System) 공급
ko.intro-history-text30: 토파스여행정보㈜ 호텔예약 웹 서비스(Web Service) 공급

en.intro-service-title2: Travel Tech Company which is changing the travel industry
en.intro-service-text1-2: We created the concept of Dynamic Package for the first time in the domestic OTA industry in 2010.
en.intro-service-text2-2: It has become the standard for most e-commerce travel meta-services since 2015.
en.intro-service-text3-2: Business travelers who work in Samsung and LG are using the platform that we supplied.
en.intro-history-text1: Supplied BTMS to Hana Tour Business
en.intro-history-text3: Supplied OTA System to Yellow Balloon Tour
en.intro-history-text5: Supplied BTMS to Red Cap Tour
en.intro-history-text6: Launched Samsung Electronics' Business Trip Management System (BTMS)
en.intro-history-text7: Launched the world's first itinerary commerce service Travel How 'Where to Go'
en.intro-history-text9: Launched Travel Haw overseas Hotel and traveler Insurance Service
en.intro-history-text10: Serviced Travel How Service to Shinhan All That Shopping
en.intro-history-text11: Partnership with Easywell Fair for overseas airlines and overseas hotel
en.intro-history-text12: Launched Domestic ticket meta-booking platform 'Travel How'
en.intro-history-text13: Launched domestic accommodation/overseas hotel mobile service to Auction Travel
en.intro-history-text15: Supplied Hotel Shilla (Samsung Group) integrated business trip management solution (CTM)
en.intro-history-text16: Launched land pack reservation and management system for the first time in Korea
en.intro-history-text17: Launched airtel a real-time reservation system for the first time in Korea
en.intro-history-text18: Launched rental car reservation service (About 40 rental car companies worldwide)
en.intro-history-text19: Launched Eurail Pass, European railway ticket, Amtrak, JR Pass real-time reservation system
en.intro-history-text20: Launched comparing prices of travel products and a real-time reservation system for the first time in Korea travel agency
en.intro-history-text21: Launched and operated Auction Travel site (tour.auction.co.kr)
en.intro-history-text22: Launched Traport airlines and hotel real-time reservation application
en.intro-history-text25: Supplied flight reservation system to BIE Airlines/Samsung Card
en.intro-history-text26: Supplied new booking engine (air, hotel) to Topas
en.intro-history-text27: Supplied wholesale filigt reservation system to Jau Tour
en.intro-history-text28: Launched www.traport.com - Dynamic package solution for the first time in Korea
en.intro-history-text29: Supplied BTMS (Business Travel Management System) to SK Tourvis
en.intro-history-text30: Supplied hotel reservation web service to Topas
en.intro-history-text31: Supplied hotel reservation system (myhanahotel.com) to Hana Tour
